html:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA SAYS 9-MONTH REPORTED REVENUE INCREASED BY 13.8% TO $2,870M WITH Q3'21 REPORTED REVENUE GROWTH OF 19.5%

  • 9M UNDERLYING EBITDA ROSE 16 PERCENT TO 1.297 BILLION USD

  • 9M BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE FELL 36.5 PERCENT TO 0.055 USD

  • AIRTEL AFRICA-WHILE COVID-19 PANDEMIC HAS HAD LITTLE IMPACT ON OUR MOST RECENT QUARTER, REMAIN VIGILANT ABOUT RECENT NEWS FLOW AROUND NEW STRAINS OF VIRUS

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: AAF.L
